website_summaries.verdict: The VivoBook 15 is perfect for anyone who needs a budget laptop with a nice big screen.
pros: It’s plenty powerful under the hood, and includes a surprisingly powerful video card
It’s slightly over the $500 mark, but worth the investment
It’s got a full suite of ports, including USB-C. It’s only 3.5 pounds, despite having a giant 15.6-inch screen
cons: The USB-C port can’t be used for charging the battery
The trackpad is slightly offset to the left, which can take some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: I need the computer for spped to process complex photos compositions.
customer_reviews.text: The computer is quite fast and very responsive and I have had great success using it to process large files in Photoshop and Lightroom. I am very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: matt steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Buy It
customer_reviews.text: 2020 ASUS VivoBook 15 15.6 Inch FHD 1080P Laptop is worth every penny. Packed with useful and easy to use technology. Quality of sound and video is wonderful. An abundance of fun.
customer_reviews.author: MoonChild

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly slow
customer_reviews.text: I really like this because it's bigger than what I'm used to. I only got this because my $90 Chromebook broke but if I knew that this $500 computer would be this slow, I probably would have gotten another Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: tylerdot01

customer_reviews.title: A perfect laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to use with my Cricut machines. This is an amazing laptop. The width on the screen is wonderful, it’s very responsive and I really like that it’s so lite. Very easy to set up and the picture quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Murray

customer_reviews.title: Do not order a Computer unless you are 100% sure you will like it. A 15% return cost is too much
customer_reviews.text: Do not order a Computer unless you are 100% sure you will like it. A 15% return cost is too much. I had no experience with the brand and thought I would give it a try. Good try, NOT, $110 lost. do not purchase unless you are 100% sure.
customer_reviews.author: ed milligan

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to go back to school when COVID hit and lost my job. Needed a new laptop, and this one fit my needs. I was not expecting to love it, but I do! The keyboard is user friendly, the system can handle on line classes and multiple screens. Everything i needed, wanted yet sleek and light.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy sportiello

customer_reviews.title: Grandma's Choice
customer_reviews.text: ASUS makes a very dependable product. This is my second ASUS and I'm happy with the ease, the speed, and the lighter weight. As a retiree, I'm on the computer a lot and this meets my needs. I expect years of satisfied use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: So I researched this for weeks. Finally Asus added a backlit keyboard. Nice touch!! But the keys have no spring action. The mouse pad is too small. I wouldn’t spend $100 for a computer that comes with design flaws.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've owned an ASUS product and I'm very impressed. It has enough power for what I need and very easy to type on. The keyboard is great! The lighted keyboard is nice, too. Love that it restarts so quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Royce

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sus on May 18 2020 in June 9 2020 I got up from using it to answer the door when I returned it had shut down and has not powered on sence
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: quit charging after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It quit charging after 6 weeks . its useless until I pay to get it fixed because it is too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: richard cooper

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Took long time to arrive. Then when it did arrive it hafablank screen and would not load.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McNally

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson & it has been perfect for his COVID online schooling.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service from seller
customer_reviews.text: As for the computer itself it’s fine. As a previous Mac owner I thought I could get away with owning a cheap windows PC but the experience is just not the same. It mostly comes into the screen quality. My biggest complaint is about the seller. My PC came defective (faulty USB port) which i let them know within 24 hours of it arriving, and they told me a return would be subject to a 20% restocking fee AND there would be no shipping label provided (so the buyer pays shipping too). I would never purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Walsh

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: I can't use my Asus laptop because after 15 months of me having it and not using it much at all. The screen went so dim I can't see anything on it. It seems like a battery replacement issue but it turns out its impossible to replace the battery myself. I never thought that I wouldn't have a working laptop a little over a year of me buying one WITH HOW LITTLE I USED IT AND HOW WELL I TOOK CARE OF IT. I wish I would have gone with a better brand instead of this lemon / complete rip off
customer_reviews.author: Evs O.

product_meta.title: 2020 ASUS VivoBook 15 15.6 Inch FHD 1080P Laptop (AMD Ryzen 3 3200U up to 3.5GHz, 8GB RAM, 128GB SSD, Radeon Vega 3, Backlit Keyboard, FP Reader, Windows 10) (Grey) + NexiGo Wireless Mouse Bundle
product_meta.description:
NexiPC sells computers with upgraded configurations. If the computer has modifications (listed above), then the manufacturer box is opened for it to be tested and inspected and to install the upgrades to achieve the specifications as advertised. If no modifications are listed, the item is unopened and untested. Defects & blemishes are significantly reduced by our in depth inspection & testing.

Operating System: Windows 10 Home 64-bit

Display: 15.6 inch FHD(1920 x 1080) with four-sided wider NanoEdge bezel display

Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200U Processor (2.6 GHz base frequency up to 3.5 GHz, 2 Cores, 1MB Cache)

Memory:8GB DDR4 RAM

Hard Drive:128GB SSD

Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 3

Wireless: 802.11ac, Bluetooth 4.1

Webcam:YES

FR Reader: YES

Audio features: Stereo speakers

Keyboard: Backlit Keyboard

Ports:

 * 1 x COMBO audio jack
 * 1 x Type-A USB 3.0 (USB 3.1 Gen 1)
 * 1 x Type-C USB 3.0 (USB 3.1 Gen 1)
 * 2 x USB 2.0 port(s)
 * 1 x HDMI

Battery Type: 2 -Cell 37 Wh Battery

Weight:3.75lbs

Dimensions: 14.4 x 9.1 x 0.8 inches

Color:Gray
feature_bullets: 【Upgraded】 Seal is opened for upgrade only, 2-years warraty on Upgraded RAM/SSD from NexiPC, and original 1-Year Manufacture warranty on remaining components. Upgraded 15.6 inch FHD(1920 x 1080) with four-sided wider NanoEdge bezel display, AMD Radeon Vega 3, AMD Ryzen 3 3200U Processor (2.6 GHz base frequency up to 3.5 GHz, 2 Cores, 1MB Cache)
RAM is upgraded to 8GB DDR4 memory for multitasking Adequate high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once

Hard Drive is upgraded to 128GB SSD provides massive storage space for huge files, so that you can store important digital data and work your way through it with ease. It gives you enormous space to save all of your files. Enhance the overall performance of the laptop for business, student, daily usage
1 x COMBO audio jack, 1 x Type-A USB 3.0 (USB 3.1 Gen 1), 1 x Type-C USB 3.0 (USB 3.1 Gen 1), 2 x USB 2.0 port(s), 1 x HDMI
【Authorized NexiGo Bundle】 Bundled with NexiGo 2.4GHz Wireless Mouse, Easy Connection, 1 AA battery needed (not included in the package), Authorized Sellers ONLY.
